name: Kon in London
tagline: It's about my life, as a Cambodian woman, in London mostly in Khmer.
body:
### Welcome to KoninLondon Pages

គេហទំព័រនេះនាងខ្ញំុសូមផ្ញើរឧទិ្ទសជូនដល់អ្នកមានគុណដែលជារឿយៗនាងខ្ញំុចង់ឲ្យពួកលោកបានឃើញនូវជិវិតក៏ដូចជាការរស់នៅប្រចំាថ្ងៃរបស់អ្នកក្រុងឡុង។
I would like to dedicate my work on these pages to my parents whom I would like to share what my life is like living in one of the biggest and busiest cities in the world. 

### Objectives 
KoninLondon will try to tell the story about people living in London from a Cambodian woman's perspective. What do you see, hear, smell, feel ... 

What Londoners do ? What are the differences between London and Phnom Penh (Where I was born and raised). 

### About me
I am Cambodian. I was born and raised in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. I have lived in Manchester, Hilversum (the Netherlands), and London for the last 4 years. I would like to share what I experience in London. 

### Contact me
email me ....
